FuncDef:
The peer ssl-server certificate command enables SSL/TLS authentication on an SSL server.
The undo peer ssl-server certificate command cancels SSL/TLS authentication on an SSL server. The peer ssl-server certificate command enables SSL/TLS authentication on an SSL server. The undo peer ssl-server certificate command cancels SSL/TLS authentication on an SSL server. By default, SSL/TLS authentication is disabled on an SSL server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a BGP peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
